channel.title: [Reward] Help with adding Dicing/Mod Crowns
channel.description: [center]Well, I have been looking at multiple tutorial's for Dicing and Mod/Admin crowns, But haven't been able to figure it out. I am using these for my Source/Client. Client- http://uppit.com/3ieopns18gf5/Darkness-Scape.rar Source- http://uppit.com/p7b4lek1gwl8/My_server.rar If you can figure it out and send the files to me so I can replace the files so I can replace the old ones, I will reward 1600MSP or $5 Paypal. [/center]

item.title: [Reward] Help with adding Dicing/Mod Crowns
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

i think crowns are cache if your adding them to game messages do somthing like this
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=1>Welcome to Multi PVP area! ");

Read full topic

item.title: [Reward] Help with adding Dicing/Mod Crowns
item.dc:creator: @TTSxClan TTSxClan
item.description:
@TTSxClan wrote:

[quote=“newman0071, post:4, topic:451614”]ahh. simple dicing tuts can be found if theres a snippet section here. just search it, if not google has hundreds of tuts on diceing, mod crowns ill respond 2morrow to tired, off to bed. night.[/quote]I’ve tried doing most of the dicing tutorials, except the client I use doesn’t have the graphic’s for them. Then when I try and look at a tutorial for one, the client I use, doesn’t have all the files too. So I try the rswebclients.com client, and the item is their, but when you try and use it, it just says ‘Nothing interesting’ or whatever it says.
Night.

Read full topic

item.title: [Reward] Help with adding Dicing/Mod Crowns
item.dc:creator: @TTSxClan TTSxClan
item.description:
@TTSxClan wrote:

No. Well, Kinda.
I DO want the crowns, but not the dicing part.
I didn’t explain myself very well the first time.
I want two different things. I want to add dicing to my server, but I also want to add the Mod Crowns and Admin Crowns to my server. Sorry for explaining it wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: [Reward] Help with adding Dicing/Mod Crowns

item.description:

are you looking to give them icons?

weird forums example:

mod icon when talking =

dicing icon when talking =

thats a weird example but kind of explains it.

basically do you want the mods and dicers in the chatbox have a crown/ dicebag to next to what they say, or a title like [dicer] or [mod]?
